about_the_game:
The Gameplay

You play as a god-like creature as big as entire solar systems. Your task as a player is to defend your home solar system from invading aliens and to protect it from natural disasters. Use your arsenal of weapons to fight off the enemy but make sure to not cause too much collateral damage!

Key Features

  • Fully destructible universe
  • 28 exciting levels with increasing difficulty
  • High score system with up to 3 stars per level - can you get a new high score ?
  • Cause chain reactions to get even higher scores
  • Planetary gravity simulation (also for fragments of planets and other objects)
  • Various weapons like laser guns, rockets, asteroids, ...
  • Space combat with allies and enemy fleets
  • Natural disasters like meteor strikes
  • Realistic spaceship physics simulation with thruster-based navigation and autonomous collision avoidance

name: Angry Universe VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: Room Scale beneficial but not required. OpenXR (tested with Quest2/3 and Valve Index - other headsets might not work as expected).
  • Additional Notes: VR ONLY!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Welcome to a VR game where you rule the universe! Break stuff, enjoy gravity physics, and survive natural disasters. And the best part? Fight off aliens using several guns or even asteroids. Try everything you can to keep your home solar system safe from the dangers out there!
